summary.span: 用作充当目录的所有区域控件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as catalogs.

summary.span: 目录包含 控件的列表，用户可将这些控件添加到网页。

span.span: Catalogs contain lists of controls that users can add to a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个基类，继承自该类类。The class is a base class that inherits from the class. 它的派生区域提供了一组基本的行为。It provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones. 类提供允许用户添加一个唯一的用户界面 (UI)控件和其他服务器控件添加到网页。The class provides a unique user interface (UI) that enables users to add controls and other server controls to Web pages. 派生自的控件类，如，是实际放置在网页的控件。Controls that derive from the class, such as , are the controls actually placed on Web pages. 它们作为容器的其他控件，称为控件，创建的用户添加到页上的服务器控件的列表。They act as containers for other controls, known as controls, that create lists of server controls for users to add to a page. 派生自的区域类可以仅当页面处于目录的显示模式时才显示。Zones that derive from the class can appear only when the page is in catalog display mode. > [!NOTE] > A区域只能包含控件，并与此相反，控件只能位于区域。A zone can contain only controls, and conversely, controls can reside only in zones. 将服务器控件添加到目录的机制是派生自基类的三个控件下面一组类。The mechanism for adding server controls to a catalog is the following set of three controls that derive from the base class. |控件Control|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||维护对已关闭在页面上的控件的引用。Maintains references to controls that have been closed on a page. 这些控件可以由用户重新打开 （重新添加到页）。These controls can be reopened (added back to the page) by users.| ||包含对在网页上的标记中的 Web 部件目录中声明的控件的引用。Contains references to controls that are declared in a Web Parts catalog in the markup of a Web page. 这些控件可以由用户添加到 Web 页。These controls can be added to a Web page by users.| ||提供用户界面，用户将定义文件上载到目录，以便该控件可以添加到网页。Provides the UI for a user to upload a definition file to a catalog so that the control can be added to a Web page. 定义文件是具有的 XML 文件。导入控制的设置的 web 部件文件名称扩展。Definition files are XML file with a .WebPart file name extension that import settings for a control. 可以导入定义文件之前，该控件必须存在于服务器上。The control must be present on the server before the definition file can be imported.| 类具有多个属性，可用于显示的目录控件。The class has a number of properties that are useful for displaying catalogs of controls. 属性引用将所选的控件从目录添加到页上，该谓词时属性引用的谓词可关闭目录并返回该页面的显示模式，若要浏览模式。The property references the verb that adds a selected control from the catalog to the page, while the property references a verb that closes the catalog and returns the page's display mode to browse mode. 属性引用的所有集合区域中的控件。The property references the collection of all controls in the zone. 多个面向文本的属性，如， ，和，重写基属性以提供适用于目录的默认文本。Several text-oriented properties, such as , , and , override base properties to provide default text appropriate for catalogs. 属性包含允许用户选择控件的区域将添加到下拉列表控件旁边的文本。The property contains the text alongside the drop-down list control that allows users to choose which zone a control will be added to. 多个其他属性都将纳入类。Several other properties are included in the class. 属性是当前所选的唯一字符串标识符控件。The property is a unique string identifier for the currently selected control. 属性指示是否显示可通过设置与控件关联的图标属性控件。The property indicates whether to show the icons that can be associated with controls by setting the property on a control. 属性包含此链接到的样式特性在区域中当前未选择的控件。The property contains style attributes for the links to the controls that are not currently selected in the zone. 与此相反，属性包含样式特性提供了指向链接用户当前选定的区域中的控件。In contrast, the property contains style attributes for a link to the control that the user has currently selected in the zone. 除了属性外，还有中的某些方法类，除了标准的事件处理和呈现方法继承自其他基控件，经过专门设计用于处理的目录控件。In addition to the properties, there are also some methods in the class, in addition to the standard event-handling and rendering methods inherited from other base controls, which are uniquely designed for the purpose of handling catalogs of controls. 方法创建 chrome （即外围 UI 元素，如边框、 谓词、 图标和标题） 环绕每个的区域中的控件，同时也处理控件的呈现。The method creates the chrome (peripheral UI elements such as a border, verbs, icons, and a title) that surrounds each control in the zone, and also handles the rendering for the controls. 方法是一个抽象方法; 派生的类重写它创建的所有实例该区域中包含的控件。The method is an abstract method; derived classes override it to create instances of all the controls contained in the zone. 如果，可以由派生类调用方法的集合区域的变化某种编程的原因，以及派生的类中的控件需要重新创建该集合。The method can be called by a derived class if the collection of controls in the zone changes for some programmatic reason, and the derived class needs to recreate the collection. 方法加载以前现有状态复选框旁边控件在目录中，每当页回发到服务器; 相反，方法保存的复选框的状态。The method loads the previously existing state for the check boxes next to the controls in the catalog, whenever the page is posted back to the server; conversely, the method saves the state of the check boxes. 最后，方法提供给每个链接的所有呈现该区域中包含的控件。Finally, the method provides all the rendering for the links to each control contained in the zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示几个声明性和以编程方式使用类。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 因为类为抽象类，这些代码示例使用派生附带 Web 部件控件集，演示的属性和方法，它继承自的类类。Because the class is abstract, the code examples use the derived class that ships with the Web Parts control set, demonstrating the properties and methods that it inherits from the class. 下面的代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使你能够更改用户控件在网页上显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 网页包含对引用控件，并演示如何使用某些密钥的某些代码类成员。A Web page that contains a reference to a control, and some code that demonstrates usage of some key class members. - 自定义添加到自定义控件控件。A custom control that is added to the custom control. - 该示例在浏览器中的工作原理说明。A description of how the example works in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是使你能够更改页面上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables you to change display modes on the page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#8)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是一个网页包含对的声明性引用控件。The second part of the code example is a Web page that contains a declarative reference to a control. 页面顶部附近是两个卡`Register`指令-一个用户控件，一个用于自定义控件。Near the top of the page are two `Register` directives--one for the user control, and one for the custom control. 请注意，下面的``元素是``包含对自定义的声明性引用的元素控件，并向 ASP.NET控件。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains declarative references to the custom control, and to an ASP.NET control. 此外提供了不同的标记的区域和设置属性以确定其外观和行为。The zone also has a variety of tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. 之间`

para.span: 如果你想要开发一个自定义区域，以便承载控件，你必须确定你是否想要提供区域模板支持。

span.span: If you want to develop a custom zone for hosting controls, you must determine whether you want to provide zone template support.

para.span: 通过实现的类型创建了一个区域模板接口，并且如果你想要启用使用自定义区域以引用的页开发人员是必需的网页的声明性标记该区域内的控件。

span.span: A zone template is created by types that implement the interface, and is necessary if you want to enable page developers using your custom zone to reference controls within your zone in the declarative markup of a Web page.

para.span: 如果您需要区域模板支持，你应继承自类。

span.span: If you need zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

para.span: 与此相反，如果你自定义的区域并将其控件会成为自包含，并将不使用任何页开发人员在区域模板中，以声明方式指定控件的选项以编程方式创建它们，然后你可以直接继承从类。

span.span: In contrast, if your custom zone and its controls are going to be self-contained, and they will be created programmatically without any options for page developers to specify controls declaratively in a zone template, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果从继承类，必须重写方法，并添加或您要在目录中其他服务器控件对象。

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you must override the method, and add the or other server controls you want in your catalog to a object.

span.span: A that enables end users to add controls from the catalog to a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加谓词引用的控件上的属性派生自类。The add verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 添加谓词添加到网页上目录中选择了最终用户控件。The add verb adds a control that an end user has selected in the catalog to a Web page. 通常情况下，添加谓词显示在用户界面 (UI) 中为控件，但它也可以是一个链接或图像。Typically, the add verb appears in the user interface (UI) as a control, although it can also be a link or an image. 添加谓词是区域级别的控件，这意味着，尽管可能存在多个在目录中的控件，添加谓词应用于由用户选择的所有控件，并将它们添加到所选区域。The add verb is a zone-level control, meaning that although there might be several controls in the catalog, the add verb applies to all the controls selected by the user and adds them to the selected zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性同时以声明方式和以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何访问以声明方式在网页中的属性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此示例自定义谓词的文本。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式，通过使用切换按钮来启用或禁用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#3)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 目录可见时，你可以检查自定义的文本上控件添加谓词中，并且你可以单击**启用或禁用谓词**按钮，以演示你可以通过编程方式访问应用谓词。When the catalog is visible, you can examine the customized text on the control for the add verb, and you can click the **Enable or Disable Verbs** button to demonstrate that you can access the apply verb programmatically.

Web 部件控件集提供的控件在默认情况下没有标头谓词。The controls provided with the Web Parts control set do not have header verbs by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对所有的集合的引用区域中的控件。The property provides a reference to a collection of all the controls in the zone. 它引用同时附带 Web 部件控件集，以及任何自定义控件添加到的区域的控件。It references both the controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and any custom controls that are added to the zone. 集合在最初创建当另一种方法访问属性，并且该属性又调用方法。The collection is initially created when another method accesses the property, and the property calls the method. > [!NOTE] > 请注意对任何，它将添加到的集合的实现中的控件方法必须具有分配给其 ID 属性的值，否则将集合分配给时引发异常属性。Note that any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性，循环访问集合，并列出的所有 Id区域中的控件。The code example shows how to access the property, iterate through the collection, and list the IDs of all the controls in the zone. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#4)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 如果该目录是可见的你可以单击**列表 CatalogParts**按钮，以演示如何可以访问属性。When the catalog is visible, you can click the **List CatalogParts** button to demonstrate how the property can be accessed.

span.span: A that enables end users to close the catalog UI on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭谓词引用的控件上的属性派生自类。The close verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 用户可以单击区域页脚中的关闭谓词。User can click the close verb in the zone footer. 当用户单击关闭谓词，任何用户选定的控件将被忽略，将关闭目录 UI，并且将页返回到正常浏览模式。When the user clicks the close verb, any controls the user has selected are ignored, the catalog UI closes, and the page returns to normal browse mode. 关闭谓词是区域级别的控件，这意味着其操作适用的整个区域的级别。The close verb is a zone-level control, meaning that its action applies at the level of the whole zone. 当用户单击关闭谓词时，将忽略已选择但不是添加到页面的任何控件、 关闭目录时，和页返回到浏览模式。When a user clicks the close verb, any controls that have been selected but not added to the page are ignored, the catalog is closed, and the page returns to browse mode. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性同时以声明方式和以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何访问以声明方式在网页中的属性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 本示例自定义用于的动词的属性。This example customizes the property for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何访问属性以编程方式，通过使用切换按钮来启用或禁用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将呈现的正文区，区域，也不能是页眉和页脚区域之间的主要内容区域包含控件。The method renders the body area of a zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法重写中的基方法类以提供地址布局和样式的专用的呈现属性仅适用于区域。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply only to zones. 该方法将呈现包含正文的全部内容的表并在该表中，设置不同的属性值，具体取决于各种条件，包括多少控件是在区域中。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including how many controls are in the zone. 如果有多个控件，为每个控件创建的链接和显示仅当前所选控件的内容。If there are multiple controls, a link is created for each control, and only the contents of the currently selected control are displayed. 在中设置特殊的样式特性为所选属性控制而不是当前未选择的。Special style attributes are set in the property for the selected control versus the ones that are not currently selected. 如果有任何该区域中的控件方法将呈现的值属性。If there are no controls in the zone, the method renders the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈现链接到单个控制在区域中，如果有多个控件。The method renders links to the individual controls in a zone if there are multiple controls. 当前所选链接，以便它从未选定控件醒目以不同的方式呈现控件。The link for the currently selected control is rendered differently so that it stands out from the unselected controls. 开发人员可以通过使用设置的选定和未选定控件链接的样式特性和属性，分别。Developers can set the style attributes for the selected and unselected control links by using the and properties, respectively. 此链接到区域中的控件不是导航; 它们是用于显示控件的用户界面 (UI)。The links to the controls in a zone are not navigational; they are for displaying the user interface (UI) of the controls. 当用户单击的控件的链接时，将隐藏任何其他显示控件的 UI，而显示为选定控件的用户界面。When a user clicks the link for a control, the UI for any other displayed control is hidden, and the UI for the selected control is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法致力于至关重要针对控件的操作 （如索引或关键字），并且独立于控件的视图状态数据的状态数据。The method is concerned with state data that is essential for a control's operation (such as an index or keyword) and is separate from the control's view-state data. 该方法首先调用基方法，以保存该控件的现有状态数据。The method first calls the base method to save the existing state data for the control. 接下来，它确定是否当前选定区域中的控件，通过检查是否属性具有值。Next, it determines whether a control in the zone is currently selected, by checking whether the property has a value. 如果没有选定的控件，该方法使用从所选控件的状态数据更新现有的状态数据，，然后返回所有的状态数据。If there is a selected control, the method updates the existing state data with the state data from the selected control, and then returns all the state data.

para.span: 你可以选择重写派生类中的方法，以便你可以更新该区域中的其他自定义对象保存的控件状态。

span.span: You can optionally override the method in a derived class so that you can update the saved control state for other custom objects in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置你选择的当前所选的标识符控件。The property allows you to set an identifier of your choice for the currently selected control. 这不会更改控件的属性值，因此你可以使用此属性用于你个人编程目的。This does not change the control's property value, so you can use this property for your own programmatic purposes. 例如，如果你想始终执行上当前所选的某些编程操作控制，此属性，你可以通过提前设置一个已知值访问该控件。For example, if you wanted to always carry out some programmatic action on the currently selected control, this property enables you to access that control through a known value that you set in advance. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以声明方式和以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 请注意，第一部分的代码示例声明了两个``元素和第一个声明的值属性。Notice that the first part of the code example declares two `` elements, and the first one declares a value for the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 在第二个部分的代码示例中，文本值显示当前所选控件的属性。In the second part of the code example, the text value for the property of the currently selected control is displayed. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/CS/catalogzonebasecs.aspx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogZoneBase_Overview/VB/catalogzonebasevb.aspx#6)] 当加载浏览器中时，你可以选择**目录**从下拉列表，以切换到目录的显示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Catalog** from the drop-down list to switch to catalog display mode. 目录可见时，单击此链接到之一控件以选中它。When the catalog is visible, click one of the links to a control to select it. 然后单击**显示选择 CatalogPart ID**按钮以显示属性值。Then click the **Show Selected CatalogPart ID** button to display the property value. 请注意该属性的值是以声明方式为该区域设置的值。Notice that the value of the property is the value that was set declaratively for the zone. 如果选择其他区域中的控件，相同的值将成为的值当选中时每个控件的属性。If you select the other controls in the zone, the same value becomes the value of the property for each control when it is selected. 如果你未设置的值属性，默认值始终是值的为当前选定控件的属性。If you do not set the value of the property, the default value is always the value of the property for the currently selected control.

summary.span: 曲目更改为区域控件的视图状态。

span.span: Tracks changes to a zone control's view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先调用基方法与关联的类，以跟踪视图状态区域。The method first calls the base method in the class to track the view state associated with a zone. 接下来，该方法将开始跟踪添加和关闭谓词的视图状态以及与关联的对象和属性。Next, the method begins tracking the view state for the add and close verbs, as well as the objects associated with the and the properties.
